Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello

Class HelloUDPClient

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.AbstractClient
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.HelloUDPClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
HelloClient
public class HelloUDPClient extends AbstractClient
Client that uses UDP protocol to send datagrams to a server and to print received data.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

  • Constructor Details

    • HelloUDPClient

      public HelloUDPClient()
      Creates client. The client should be started with run(String, int, String, int, int).

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(String host, int port, String prefix, int threads, int requests)
      Runs Hello client. This method should return when all requests are completed.
      Parameters:
      host - server host
      port - server port
      prefix - request prefix
      threads - number of request threads
      requests - number of requests per thread.
      Throws:
      UncheckedIOException - if an error occurred when getting address or creating socket

    • sendTask

      private void sendTask(String prefix, int requests, int port, InetAddress address, int thread)

    • sendAndReceive

      private boolean sendAndReceive(DatagramSocket socket, DatagramPacket packet, DatagramPacket receivePacket, int[] originInts)

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      CLI for client. Usage: 
      HelloUDPClient <host> <port> <prefix> <threads> <requests>
      where host name or ip of the server, port - port, send requests to which, prefix - prefix of all query, thread - number of query workers, requests - number of requests in each thread
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
